content: *this little wreath is about 4 5cm / 2 ½ diameter if made with worsted yarn and 3 5mm/e hook and it can be completed in 5 minutes you could use it for dollhouse decoration as an applique on doll clothes or small accessories glue it on gift cards or even turn it into festive earrings after starching * **tools and materials ** ~ scraps of yarn in green and red - any weight including thread will work it will only influence the finished size ~ hook matching your chosen yarn weight ~ yarn needle pair of scissors ~ optional clear nail polish or white glue
